arts.ttl: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea keen on Sporting CP prospect Dario Essugo
arts.sum: Chelsea make progress in their pursuit of Sporting Lisbon's Dário Essugo as Juventus ponder a summer deal for Joshua Zirkzee . The 19-year-old has caught the eye on loan at Las Palmas this season, playing 14 times so far in LaLiga while scoring once.

arts.ttl: La Liga round-up: Real Betis blow two-goal lead as Athletic Club and Villarreal pick up victories
arts.sum: MD23 of the 2024-25 La Liga season continued on Saturday with four more matches. The derby between Real Madrid and Atletico Madrid is the highlight fixture, but there were three other games to wet the appetite ahead of that clash at the Santiago Bernabeu. Celta Vigo 3-2 Real Betis The lunchtime kick-off at Balaidos was […] The post La Liga round-up: Real Betis blow two-goal lead as Athletic Club and Villarreal pick up victories appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Las Palmas star in talks over contract termination
arts.sum: La Liga outfit Las Palmas have opened talks with goalkeeper Álvaro Valles, over the termination of his contract with the club. That’s according to Marca, who have on Friday provided…

arts.ttl: Preview: Las Palmas vs. Villarreal - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's La Liga clash between Las Palmas and Villarreal, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
